languages.text: {n}Вокс техножреца хрипит сильнее обычного.{/n} "Данная гипотеза имеет право на существование, но маловероятна. Ее истинность не является значимой, так как она не отрицает необходимость установления судьбы архимагоса Амарната".

{n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс техножреца хрипит сильнее обычного.{/n} "Данная гипотеза имеет право на существование, но маловероятна. Ее истинность не является значимой, так как она не отрицает необходимость установления судьбы архимагоса Амарната".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音比平时更加生涩。{/n}“这是个有效的假设，但可能性并不高。这个假设是真是假并不重要，因为无论结果如何，确认阿玛纳特大贤者的下场都是十分必要的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音比平时更加生涩。{/n}“这是个有效的假设，但可能性并不高。这个假设是真是假并不重要，因为无论结果如何，确认阿玛纳特大贤者的下场都是十分必要的事情。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El sonido del voco del tecnosacerdote es más áspero de lo habitual.{/n} «Es una hipótesis válida, pero improbable. Su veracidad es irrelevante, puesto que no contradice la necesidad de determinar el destino del Archimagos Amarnat».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del tecnosacerdote es más áspera de lo habitual.{/n} «Es una hipótesis válida, pero improbable. Su veracidad es irrelevante, puesto que no contradice la necesidad de determinar el destino del Archimagos Amarnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭のヴォクスはいつもより荒いものだった。{/n}「それは有効な仮説だが、可能性は高くない。大賢人アマルナトの運命を明らかにする必要性と矛盾しないので、その真実の価値は考慮に値しないものだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭のヴォクスはいつもより荒いものだった。{/n}「それは有効な仮説だが、可能性は高くない。大賢人アマルナトの運命を明らかにする必要性と矛盾しないので、その真実の価値は考慮に値しないものだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Vox des Techpriesters klingt krächziger als gewöhnlich.{/n} "Eine mögliche Hypothese, wenn auch keine sehr wahrscheinliche. Ihr Wahrheitsgehalt ist irrelevant, da sie nicht im Widerspruch zu der Notwendigkeit steht, das Schicksal von Erzmagos Amarnat zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox des Techpriesters klingt krächziger als gewöhnlich.{/n} "Eine mögliche Hypothese, wenn auch keine sehr wahrscheinliche. Ihr Wahrheitsgehalt ist irrelevant, da sie nicht im Widerspruch zu der Notwendigkeit steht, das Schicksal von Erzmagos Amarnat zu ergründen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le vox du technoprêtre est plus rauque qu'à son habitude.{/n} « C'est une théorie qui se tient, mais elle demeure très peu probable. Son degré de vérité importe peu, car elle ne réfute pas le besoin de déterminer le sort de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox du technoprêtre est plus rauque qu'à son habitude.{/n} « C'est une théorie qui se tient, mais elle demeure très peu probable. Son degré de vérité importe peu, car elle ne réfute pas le besoin de déterminer le sort de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in voksu, normalde çok daha fazla kulak tırmalıyor.{/n} "Geçerli ancak pek de olası olmayan bir hipotez. Başmagos Amarnat'ın kaderini tayin etme gereksinimini ortadan kaldırmadığından doğruluk derecesi de önemsiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's vox is raspier than usual.{/n} "That is a valid hypothesis, but not a very likely one. Its truth value is irrelevant, as it does not contradict the necessity of establishing the fate of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in voksu her zamankinden daha da kulak tırmalayıcı.{/n} "Bu geçerli bir hipotez ancak ihtimali çok yüksek değil. Doğruluğunun değeri de bulunmamakta, çünkü Başmagos Amarnat'ın kaderinin tayin edilmesi gereksinimiyle çelişmemekte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
